videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: The ultimate lifegain commander.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a monowhite lifegain deck, featuring Ajani, Strength of the Pride as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro 
01:35 - Deck Tech
07:21 - vs Marchesa, Dealer of Death
16:58 - vs Amalia Benavides Aguirre
26:20 - vs Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
31:38 - vs Klothys, God of Destiny
36:29 - vs Tinybones, the Pickpocket
41:29 - vs Rowan, Scion of War
44:05 - vs Gornog, the Red Reaper

Decklist: 
https://aetherhub.com/Deck/ajani-strength-of-the-pride-brawl
